top_team.description: Y coordinates for 1st, 2nd, and 3rd skills of top team heroes

bottom_team.description: Y coordinates for 1st, 2nd, and 3rd skills of bottom team heroes

skills_grid.description: Two 3x3 grids: top team and bottom team, each with 3 heroes and 3 skills per hero

fuzzy_matching.description: Minimum similarity score for fuzzy matching OCR text to skill names. Higher values reduce false matches but may miss some edge cases (handled by OCR corrections).

winner_detection.description: Area where winner indicator appears - detects 胜 (team 1 wins), 败 (team 2 wins), or 平 (draw - battle should be discarded)

output_format.description: save_ocr_corrections: saves image crops + OCR text + user-corrected text pairs. use_ocr_corrections: uses saved corrections to improve OCR accuracy automatically.
